name: It's All About Numbers Trivia Game | By The Numbers | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many states are in the United States?
What 'number' movie starred Brad Pitt and Morgan Freeman?
What date number was a big hit for singer Prince?
questions.explanation:
1999.

	Other hits by Prince include "Little Red Corvette", "When Doves Cry", and "Purple Rain".

questions.text: Fill in the Blank, Winnie the Pooh lives in the ________ acre woods?
What year was the title of a George Orwell Novel?
On Schoolhouse Rock on Saturday mornings, what number was 'My Hero'?
How many people are in the Musical group 'Ben Folds Five'?
questions.explanation:
3.

	There are 3 members, don't know where they got the 5.

questions.text: How many wheels are there on a traditional wheelbarrow?
In the Bible story 'Noah's Ark', for how many days did it rain?
Triskadecaphobia is the fear of which number?
